student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! Welcome to the museum. Let’s explore together. The entrance is right here. Where would you like to go first?
I want to see the dinosaur exhibit.

Great choice! The dinosaur exhibit is on the second floor. Take the stairs or the elevator to your left. When you reach the second floor, turn right, and you’ll see it straight ahead. Let me know if you need help!
Thanks! I will take the stairs. Do you like dinosaurs?
Yes, I love dinosaurs! They are so fascinating. The exhibit has a big T-Rex skeleton and some smaller dinosaurs too. You’ll also find interesting facts about them on the walls. Enjoy your visit!
Dinosaurs are very cool! I like T-Rex. What is your favorite dinosaur?
I really like the Triceratops! It has three horns and a big frill. It’s so unique. I hope you enjoy the exhibit! Let me know if you’d like to explore other parts of the museum after this.
I will! What else can I see here?
Good job! You’ve done great explaining and exploring the museum. There’s also an art gallery and a history section you can check out next time. Talk to you later! Have a wonderful day!
